description._content: Image taken from: Title: "[Madagascar: or, Robert Drury's Journal, during fifteen years captivity on that island ... The whole ... illustrated with a sheet map of Madagascar, and cuts. Written by himself [or rather, by D. Defoe?], etc. [With “A Vocabulary of the Madagascar Language.”]]", "Minor Single Works" Author: Defoe, Daniel Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10095.p.6.", "British Library HMNTS G.15067." Page: 242 Place of Publishing: Hull Date of Publishing: 1807 Publisher: Stodart & Craggs Edition: [Another edition.] The Adventures of Robert Drury, during fifteen years captivity on the island of Madagascar ... Written by himself, and now carefully revised and corrected from the original copy. MS. notes [by H. Minet]. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000892988 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
